review: Dr. Ramya Raghavan explained the potential rootcause of the ailment clearly and suggested the needed actions. Highly recommend her.
Dr Ramya is very good. listens to you carefully.. best part she prescribes medicines only if needed. I would definitely recommend her. Especially for diabetic, lifestyle diseases  n viral infections.
Pathetic, she doesn’t care about the patient timing. Have been waiting for 2 hours. Don’t go with this doctor.
Excellent diagnostic analysis. Explained in detail about the illness and followup medication. Explained about further action to be undertaken.
